============================================
core/subroutines/static_type_id_create
============================================

packet = packet_in::type_id::create("packet", this);

----

(source_file
  (statement
    (statement_item
      (blocking_assignment
        (operator_assignment
          (variable_lvalue
            (hierarchical_identifier
              (simple_identifier)))
          (assignment_operator)
          (expression
            (primary
              (function_subroutine_call
                (subroutine_call
                  (method_call
                    (class_type
                      (simple_identifier)
                      (simple_identifier))
                    (method_call_body
                      name: (simple_identifier)
                      arguments: (list_of_arguments
                        (expression
                          (primary
                            (primary_literal
                              (string_literal
                                (quoted_string)))))
                        (expression
                          (primary))))))))))))))
